query: mutation createBody($command: CreateBodyCommandInput!) {  createBody(command: $command) {  ...body  __typename  } }  fragment body on Body {  reference  shortName  name  description  levels {  reference  shortName  name  __typename  }  financialDimension {  reference  code  description  __typename  }  vertical {  reference  name  __typename  }  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }
